nodes.text: Bomb droids were a type of droid. Bomb droids were designed to seek out a target and detonate once near enough, and as such were basically a bomb on legs. They uttered a battle cry as they charged a target. Bomb droids were used by the Trade Federation onboard their flagship Saak'ak and on the planet Naboo during the Invasion of Naboo in the year 32 BBY. They exploded on impact if subject to a Force push by a Jedi, and could also be destroyed by a blaster shot, lightsaber strike, or explosion.

Bomb droids appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Obi-Wan and received an entry in the game's strategy guide. They attack the player in several missions during the Naboo portions of the game. Two bomb droids escort the Queen during an altered scene from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.
